content:
That's great to hear! It's wonderful that you've managed to get back into playing badminton regularly, especially after the motivation from your company's annual tournament last month. Consistency is key to improving your skills and enjoying the game.

How do you feel about your progress so far? Have you noticed any improvements in your game, or are there still areas you're working on? Do you have any goals for your badminton journey, such as participating in more tournaments or improving your ranking in your company's league?
